title: Mechanical Engineering
subtitle: Quality is our Identity
text: Since then founded, We have been pioneering in advanced simulations in Mechanical Engineering such as CAD/CAM/CAE/CFD. With our expertise in Mechanical Engineering, Electronics and Embedded Systems, Enterprise and Product Engineering software, we support aero systems, avionics, airframes and cabin systems. Our offshore Centres of Excellence allow you to leverage a global pool of talent for high-volume tasks.
